turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello. Where would you like me to order a coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Um... Let's do Starbucks. I really like their coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What is the address of the nearest location to you? If you need assistance, I can look up the nearest locations

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do the Starbucks on 127th Street in Manhattan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Which type of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Mocha Latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like your coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will put the order in for you. Is there anything else you need help with?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will send you the confirmation number and receipt to your mobile device.
